home.title: Welcome :)
home.ingress: Finally! the cows are out grazing in the cyber pasture, once again
home.body: Here you will find pictures and information about all our cows. The cows sorted under their respective lineage and the bulls in some obscure order. The page gets a little boring without pictures ... While waiting for our photos, you get random professional photos.
